description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNEWNET-37490	PatternColorSpace support in new generator

Enhancements
PDFNET-41130 Gradient color support in new DOM
PDFNEWNET-38915 PDF to DOC: Set default ImageResolutions to 300 dpi

Execeptions
PDFNEWNET-40788 TableAbsorber throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException for page without table
PDFNEWNET-40787 TableAbsorber thows InvalidOperationException for page with one table
PDFNEWNET-40735 Text replacement throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException
PDFNEWNET-40640 PDF to HTML conversion throws ArgumentEception unhandled
PDFNEWNET-40525 PDF to HTML: Exception issue when converting document to html after cleanup
PDFNET-41207 TableAbsorber throws InvalidOperation Exception

Bugs
PDFNET-41279 Tex to HTML - InvalidOperationException during conversion
PDFNEWNET-39139 PDF to TIFF: consumes a lot of memory
PDFNEWNET-40725 PDF to PDFA1a conversion results in-compliant PDFA document
PDFNET-41276 PDF to XPS conversion loses the background image
PDFNET-41091 PDF to PDFA converts highlight annotation into black rectangle
PDFNEWNET-30629 Issue in conversion from SVG to PDF
PDFNEWNET-39443 PDF to PDF/A - Unable to access conversion log information saved in Stream
PDFNEWNET-38221 PDF to PDF/A - Black background appears
PDFNEWNET-36778 HTML to PDF - Formatting issues in resultant PDF
PDFNET-41105 PDF to PDF/A - Contents are rotated at 90 degree in resultant file
PDFNET-41055 PDF to PDFA_1b: Page contents are missing/redacted
PDFNET-41054 PDF to PDFA: Page contents are missing/redacted
PDFNET-41030 PDF to PDF/A - Formatting issues in resultant file
PDFNET-40968 GetColor method of SetCMYKColorStroke operator is not implemented
PDFNET-40920 PDF to PDF/A - Error when viewing resultant file
PDFNEWNET-40845 PDFA compliance issue
PDFNEWNET-40754 ImagePlacementAbsorber can not define correct position and size of images in XForm
PDFNEWNET-40666 Inline image not rendered correctly when layout is right aligned
PDFNEWNET-40449 PDF to HTML: some characters are missing in resultant HTML
PDFNEWNET-40448 PDF to PNG: some characters are missing in resultant PNG
PDFNEWNET-35778 PCL to PDF: formatting lost issue
PDFNET-41208 Adding Graph line into PDF document hangs system forever
PDFNET-41026 PDF to PDFA: checkboxes are rendered as black boxes
PDFNEWNET-39290 PDF to HTML - Some characters are not properly rendering
PDFNET-41264 PDF to JPEG: contents are missing in resultant image
PDFNEWNET-40772 EPUB to PDF conversion throws the operation not supported error
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
